name: Memories
tagline: Keep track of your best moments everywhere!
body:
# Installation #

**Dependencies:**

 * Ubuntu SDK
 * U1db - qtdeclarative5-u1db1.0
 * Ubuntu Mobile Icons - ubuntu-mobile-icons

To test run the following commands
    
    qmlscene qml/memories.qml

You can build your own click package to be installed on your devices just by running

    click build Memories/

# Features #
 
 * Adaptive layout so that the app looks good on every device
 * Tags support to allow to filter memories
 * HTML instead of simple text for memory content
 * Associate photos with your memories
 * Camera support
 * Different view layouts for the home page
 * Localization support
 * Social Networks sharing
 * Protect your memories with a password
 * Sync with UbuntuOne personal cloud database

# Contribution #

If you are a programmer you can fix any reported and approved bugs in the GitHub's issue tracker.
Reporting bugs is another glad form of contribution, just as glad as translations. 
If you don't want to code and you don't want to translate but you still want to contribute you can donate a few euros to developers through the 'Donate' link you will find in the app about page.

See the [Wiki](https://github.com/Mefrio/Memories/wiki) page for some information.

# License #

Memories is Open Source software and is released under the GPLv3. Feel free to share and to reuse its code as you want. See `LICENSE` for more information.
